p.s: PHP wrapper for SharedBook Open API
p.d: SharedBook has developed a unique, on demand reverse publishing platform to help businesses and consumers extract, manipulate and publish the Internet content. SharedBook now has an Open API (Application Programming Interface). Now anyone can write a program that will transfer data to the SharedBook platform and utilize our full functionality to create revenue-producing books, both online and off. This package is a wrapper for Open API calls, handles XML responses, file uploads.
